flow-definition.description: ENM Cloud Native Upgrade Build pipeline MT_cENM_Upgrade_Functional_Flow - autogenerated using JobDSL - all manual changes will be overwritten!

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: deployment_mechanism
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter acts as the flow controller to select the deployment mechanism either charts or csar.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: environment_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The deployment name to run the job against

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: stage_area
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This parameter acts as the flow controller to download charts from internal area or release area

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: bro_chart_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide bro chart version to upgrade

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: pre_deploy_chart_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: provide Pre Deploy integration chart version to upgrade

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: infra_chart_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: provide infra integration chart version to upgrade

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: stateless_chart_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide stateless chart version to upgrade

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: integration_value_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Provide the integartion values version to upgrade

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: csar_package_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: please provide the csar package version to upgrade
